name: Solar System (itch) (Laslipie)
description:
This is my Solar System project. i added the following elements:

  • Sun
  • Earth + Moon
  • Mercury
  • Venus
  • Mars
  • Jupiter
  • Comets

There is music in the game.

By pressing the left mouse button, you can look at a specific planet. Click on the right mouse button to switch to default mode

Credits

Created by Diana Galimova
